name: Baby Game-Birthday cake decoration 1
description:
When we celebrate a birthday, a delicious birthday cake is a must!
You can use challenge mode to copy a design or you can choose free mode where you can decorate a cake to your own taste! Do you like birthday cakes?
In this game you will learn how to decorate a fabulous cake.
Start by choosing the texture and then decorate it using your brilliant idea.
Enjoy each step of this game!
